New Records: Argentina are on a 5-match winning streak in World Cup qualifying since July 2019, their only defeat in 62 matches coming against Uruguay in September 2023.
Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister is likely to miss the match due to injury after pulling up in training.
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina are favorites to win against Chile, who are struggling in qualifying.
Argentina have a strong record against Chile, last beating them 1-0 in World Cup qualifying in October 2008.
Chile are missing key players like Claudio Bravo, Alexis Sanchez, and Arturo Vidal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina are expected to secure a routine victory on home soil.
The match is significant for both teams' World Cup qualification hopes.
Others: Argentina are predicted to win 2-0, according to the preview.
